column2: Aiyo! Who are you da? Why'd you come in the ground when we're playing?-Don't you know who I am?!
Oh Appadi ah! You should have said that before only.-Yes bumzot told me about you.
Now listen to me carefully. This is the task that'll give-you a ticket to the inner circle!
I want you to go to the girls hostel and fetch me an-undergarment from there. Now don't ask too many questions and get lost.
